text: Azzedine Alaïa (; , ; 26 February 1935 – 18 November 2017) was a Tunisian haute couture fashion designer based in Paris. In 2008, he was awarded the Legion of Honour by the French government. In 2011, he started showing his collections on the catwalk again after an eight-years pause. In 2015, he was celebrated at the Galleria Borghese in Rome with an exhibition called "Couture/Sculpture: Azzedine Alaïa in the History of Fashion". ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Fashion designers Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:People from Tunis Category:Twin people
title: Azzedine Alaïa
